EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Applicant, Thank you for your recent application for a Mobil Card account.
After careful consideration, we regret to inform that your application does not meet our approval conditions. If you would like to re-apply for a Mobil Card account in the future, we may reconsider your application. If you would like to discuss your application with one of our Credit team members, please call 1300 173 435.
Kind regards,
Mobil Oil Australia Pty Ltd.
This is a computer generated e-mail and no signature is required.
